comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body:
Patch looks good, thanks Luke!  I'll commit to trunk shortly.

Unfortunately, the patch doesn't apply cleanly to 2.9.x -- can you post a version that does?  (Or we can commit only to trunk...).

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body: OK I back-ported the javadoc improvements to 2.9.x, and just committed.  Thanks Luke!

description: Some of the javadoc for the new TokenStream/Tokenizer/TokenFilter/Token APIs had javadoc errors.  To the best of my knowledge, I corrected these and refined the copy a bit.
